issue.title: [Go][Packaging] Revisit the license file attachment to the go packages
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9044](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9044). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
As per https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/7355#issuecomment-639560475

A nicer solution would be to rename the top level LICENSE.txt to LICENSE, so we wouldn't need to maintain another copy of it.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9044?focusedCommentId=17148582) by Krisztian Szucs (kszucs):*
The go packaging issue should be resolved by https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/7376

Renaming the top level LICENSE.txt file would be a too invasive change for the 1.0 release, so I'm postponing it to 2.0
